Language.000001_0:
```python
def transform_dataset(test_set):
    language_codes = {
        'Arabic': 'ar', 'Basque': 'eu', 'Bosnian': 'bs', 'Bulgarian': 'bg', 'Catalan': 'ca',
        'Chinese - Simplified': 'zh-CN', 'Chinese - Traditional': 'zh-TW', 'Croatian': 'hr',
        'Czech': 'cs', 'Danish': 'da', 'Dutch': 'nl', 'English': 'en', 'Estonian': 'et',
        'Finnish': 'fi', 'French': 'fr', 'Galician': 'gl', 'German': 'de', 'Greek': 'el',
        'Gujarati': 'gu', 'Hebrew': 'he', 'Hindi': 'hi', 'Hungarian': 'hu', 'Icelandic': 'is',
        'Indonesian': 'id', 'Italian': 'it', 'Japanese': 'ja', 'Kazakh': 'kk', 'Kannada': 'kn',
        'Korean': 'ko', 'Latvian': 'lv', 'Lithuanian': 'lt', 'Malay': 'ms', 'Malayalam': 'ml',
        'Marathi': 'mr', 'Norwegian': 'no', 'Polish': 'pl', 'Portuguese - Brazil': 'pt-BR',
        'Portuguese - Portugal': 'pt-PT', 'Romanian': 'ro', 'Russian': 'ru', 'Serbian': 'sr',
        'Slovakian': 'sk', 'Slovenian': 'sl', 'Spanish': 'es', 'Swedish': 'sv', 'Tamil': 'ta',
        'Telugu': 'te', 'Thai': 'th', 'Turkish': 'tr', 'Ukrainian': 'uk', 'Vietnamese': 'vi'
    }
    
    return [[f"{lang[0]} = {language_codes.get(lang[0], 'unknown')}"] for lang in test_set]

# Example usage
test_set = [
    ['Arabic'], ['Basque'], ['Bosnian'], ['Bulgarian'], ['Catalan'], 
    ['Chinese - Simplified'], ['Chinese - Traditional'], ['Croatian'], 
    ['Czech'], ['Danish'], ['Dutch'], ['English'], ['Estonian'], ['Finnish'], 
    ['French'], ['Galician'], ['German'], ['Greek'], ['Gujarati'], ['Hebrew'], 
    ['Hindi'], ['Hungarian'], ['Icelandic'], ['Indonesian'], ['Italian'], 
    ['Japanese'], ['Kazakh'], ['Kannada'], ['Korean'], ['Latvian'], ['Lithuanian'], 
    ['Malay'], ['Malayalam'], ['Marathi'], ['Norwegian'], ['Polish'], 
    ['Portuguese - Brazil'], ['Portuguese - Portugal'], ['Romanian'], ['Russian'], 
    ['Serbian'], ['Slovakian'], ['Slovenian'], ['Spanish'], ['Swedish'], 
    ['Tamil'], ['Telugu'], ['Thai'], ['Turkish'], ['Ukrainian'], ['Vietnamese']
]
output = transform_dataset(test_set)
print(output)
```

def language_code_transformation(test_set):
    language_map = {
        'Arabic': 'ar',
        'Basque': 'eu',
        'Bosnian': 'bs',
        'Bulgarian': 'bg',
        'Catalan': 'ca',
        'Chinese - Simplified': 'zh',
        'Chinese - Traditional': 'zh-TW',
        'Croatian': 'hr',
        'Czech': 'cs',
        'Danish': 'da',
        'Dutch': 'nl',
        'English': 'en',
        'Estonian': 'et',
        'Finnish': 'fi',
        'French': 'fr',
        'Galician': 'gl',
        'German': 'de',
        'Greek': 'el',
        'Gujarati': 'gu',
        'Hebrew': 'he',
        'Hindi': 'hi',
        'Hungarian': 'hu',
        'Icelandic': 'is',
        'Indonesian': 'id',
        'Italian': 'it',
        'Japanese': 'ja',
        'Kazakh': 'kk',
        'Kannada': 'kn',
        'Korean': 'ko',
        'Latvian': 'lv',
        'Lithuanian': 'lt',
        'Malay': 'ms',
        'Malayalam': 'ml',
        'Marathi': 'mr',
        'Norwegian': 'no',
        'Polish': 'pl',
        'Portuguese - Brazil': 'pt-BR',
        'Portuguese - Portugal': 'pt-PT',
        'Romanian': 'ro',
        'Russian': 'ru',
        'Serbian': 'sr',
        'Slovakian': 'sk',
        'Slovenian': 'sl',
        'Spanish': 'es',
        'Swedish': 'sv',
        'Tamil': 'ta',
        'Telugu': 'te',
        'Thai': 'th',
        'Turkish': 'tr',

    }
    
    return [[language_map[lang[0]]] for lang in test_set]
